channel.title: King Decide Fate Bug
channel.description: #### What happened? King isn't able to decide fate at any time. #### What was SUPPOSED to happen? King was able to use Decide Fate #### Steps to reproduce: Vote someone up as king, press Execute and decide fate will still be blanked out. #### Comments: https://steamuserimages-a.akamaihd.net/ugc/867368163163967914/16DDB05D21D22510E5F141CF672F9F8192E8D07A/
